snippet: For the first time, the Census Bureau is giving households a chance to respond to government surveys over the Internet, part of an effort to save money and improve sagging response rates.
abstract: Census Bureau is for first time giving households a chance to respond to government surveys over the Internet in effort to save money and improve poor response rates.
lead_paragraph: For the first time, the Census Bureau is giving households a chance to respond to government surveys over the Internet, part of an effort to save money and improve sagging response rates.

headline.seo: Online Census Surveys Start This Week
headline.main: Online Census Surveys Are Starting This Week
headline.print_headline: Online Census Surveys Are Starting This Week
